iati-activity.title: Administrative costs at MFA from the Embassy of Finland in Zagreb
iati-activity.description: Administrative costs at MFA, related to ODA. These costs cover all costs that can be counted (in full or percentually) as ODA at the Ministry for Foreign Affairs in Finland. Administrative costs at MFA from the Embassy of Finland in Zagreb

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Biodiversity Protection in Croatian Kornati Archipelago. Inventarisation of terrestrial species in the Kornati Archipelago. Through the project an important data will be collected and published to be used for scientific research_ environmental protection and educating general public.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Ensuring Sustainability of Comm. Act. Conducted by Marginalized Youth. The goal of the project _Ensuring Sustainability of Community Activities Conducted by Marginalized Youth_ is to provide tools for young Roma and other marginalized youth in order to get actively involved in the community. The project duration is 12 months (1.4.2009-1.4.2010).
iati-activity.sector: Support to local and regional NGOs

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Phase I; setting up organic co-ops on landmine fields. Promoting the conversion of landmine fields to certified organic co-op farms. Setting up of co-ops in less developed rural areas in Croatia with the aim to cultivate and harvest grown/wild_ edible grass/plants on organic-certified soil parcels. Facilitate connection for co-ops and marketing incorporating âfair tradeâ principles in sustainable supplies relationships. Introduce better processing techniques of the raw harvested material and placement on the market of the finished and semi-finished product. Address immediate market needs for âwildâ and âtransitioningâ products_ until organic certification is complete.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Right to Access to Information Act. Improving the implementation of the Law on the Right to Access Information and accountability of the public administration. The project includes survey willingness of public officials to give public information_ raise awareness on the Law on the Right to Access Information and give legal assistance to citizens. Workshop will be held with Slovenian NGO partners.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Access to Justice Through Free Court Representations. The project aims at supporting the process of refugee return and community reconcilation by providing free access to justice to socially vulnerable population (refugees_ returnees_ displaced persons_ etc.) in the area of Western Slavonia. The project duration is 6 months (1.12.2008-31.5.2009).

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Center for Victims of Sexual Violence. The project 'Center for victimgs of sexual violence' will provide assistance and support (e.g. counselling, threpy, legal assistance) for the victims of sexual violence, organise professional education, training of volunteers, raise awareness on sexual violence and help to improve professional guidelines for the protection of victims of sexual violence.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Education of Judges II. Project 'Education of Judges' is continuation to the earlier project which aims at improving the capacity of Croatia's legal system by training judges and prosecutors on human rights legislation. Project consists of a seminar in which Finnish legal experts will train Croatian judges and prosecutors on human rights law. The project will be implemented in cooperation with Croatia's Judicial Academy.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Some Other Stories. Promotion of gender equality and tolerance through producing and screening of a short film as a joint project of five women directors from five countries of the region.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Capacity Building Program for Roma Minority Leaders and Representatives. The project will increase monitoring, reporting and advocating capacities of Roma minority leaders and representatives through a seminar and follow-up trainings, especially focusing on the Framework Convention on the Rights of National Minorities.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Support to Vulnerable Children of Serbian Minority. Project âSupport to Vulnerable Children of Serbian Minority from War-Affected Areaâ will support traumatized children and families in Dvor County by visiting homes, offering psychological assistance and arranging group activities.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Administrative costs of Fund for Local Cooperation

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The project will help unemployed people of the war-affected areas of Croatia to produce and market ecological, herb-based products.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The project will assess public attitudes and raise discussion about the amendments of the Constitution of the Republic of Croatia through conductiong an opinion poll and arranging a round table with legal experts and politicians.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The project "Water Supply and Provision of Social and Health Services for Displaced Persons and Refugees in Refugee Camp Mala Gorica" will increase the accessibility of social and health services among the target group.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The project gives free legal aid to socially vulnerable population in the area of Western Slavonia. The project supports refugee return, community reconciliation and better legal protection of vulnerable population. The project duration is from April to December 2010.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The students of the Graduate Program in Entrepreneurship of the University of Osijek will make a study trip to Finland in April-May 2010, as part of a longer-term cooperation with the University of Turku. The study trip will give participants deeper understanding of innovation, business development and give useful contacts. Improving the entrepreneurial skills of students and giving new business ideas will indirectly help to develop economically the region of Eastern Slavonia.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The Project "Providing Support for Victims of Domestic Violence" will provide women who have experienced domestic violence with psycho-social support and legal aid. It will also train representatives of the judiciary system, police and social welfare to deal with victims of domestic violence.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The project will improve implementation of the Aarhus Convention, access to justice and public participation on decision-making in environmental matters through specialised training of judges, lawyers, journalists and experts from Croatia, Bosnia-Herzegovina and Montenegro.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Completing the field work and documenting the status of war victims in the Sisak-Moslavina area. Organising an expert consultation on the status of war victims in Zagreb in September 2010.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The project "Center for victims of sexual violence" will provide assistance and support (e.g. counselling, threpy, legal assistance) for the victims of sexual violence, organise professional education, training of volunteers, raise awareness on sexual violence and help to improve professional guidelines for the protection of victims of sexual violence.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: The Human Rights Center in cooperation with Legal Service Coalition and Croatian and international experts will compile a study on how to improve the implementation of the Free Legal Aid Law.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Conducting research on the Kornati National Park fauna and biodiversity which will contribute to the Croatiaâs obligations towards Natura 2000 criteria. The research will focus on the local bat species. Building environmental awareness of the local youth through education and picture-books.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Training and capacity building of selected Roma representatives on monitoring, reporting, advocacy and also basic international conventions and mechanisms related to the minority rights. The project is continuation to the earlier capacity building project for the Roma representatives.

iati-activity.title: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in Croatia
iati-activity.description: Zenska Soba (Women's Room): Center for Victims of Sexual Violence. The project aims at establishing a center for the victims of sexual violence. The center will provide the victims with immediate help in confronting the situation.
